commit.message:
re PR middle-end/30751 (internal compiler error: in extract_insn, at recog.c:2108)

	PR middle-end/30751
	* lower-subreg.c (resolve_simple_move): Decompose subregs in
	addresses.

From-SVN: r121894

 	* gcc/config/i386/i386.md (fixuns_truncdfhi2): Require SSE2.
